overview:
Clifford Lerner is the President and CEO of SNAP Interactive, Inc. (STVI), a publicly traded company in the social networking space. Cliff co-founded the company with his brother Darrell in 2005, after raising $750K privately from friends and family. Previously, he worked on Wall Street as an equities analyst at Lehman Brothers. Cliff has a strong knowledge and understanding of the online dating and social networking industries and has managed the product development and growth for all of SNAP’s applications and websites since its inception. Cliff received a bachelor’s degree in applied economics and business management from Cornell University in 2000.

SNAP Interactive is a leading provider of online dating and social networking applications. SNAP’s flagship brand, AreYouInterested.comÂ®, is one of the largest social dating applications on the Internet with over 55 million installs, and offers a completely integrated Facebook, iPhone, Android and Web app.
